'''Gorgol the Butcher''' was an [[Orcs|Orc]] of the [[First Age]], who was mentioned in ''[[The Lay of Leithian Recommenced|The Lay of Leithian]]'' as being hewn by [[Beren]] in [[Dorthonion]] during the recounting of Beren's deeds of valor as an outlaw.<ref name="Gorgol"/>
